entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Snow or rain showers late in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming south 30 late in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
